name: Jetlore
overview: Founded by Stanford Ph.D. students, Jetlore has developed technology to infer semantic context from social posts. Jetlore’s search and analytics platform allows consumer companies to import social identities of their users (Twitter/Facebook credentials) and have Jetlore run its algorithms on their profiles and feed. The platform provides rich user profile analytics and real-time semantic social context (e.g., relevant photo albums and posts). Jetlore’s own product Qwhisper exemplifies consumer experience built around social context: it is designed for browsing and searching one’s Facebook and Twitter content by topics.
